current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To withhold the salary of the Director of OMB upon
		  failure to submit the President’s budget to Congress as required by section
		  1105 of title 31, United States Code.

introduced

			 Governmental Affairs
